meanings.definition: A person or thing that explains.
meanings.sent1: The teacher was a great explainer of difficult concepts.
meanings.sent2: The explainer at the museum helped visitors understand the exhibits.
meanings.sent3: The talking robot claimed to be the ultimate explainer of the universe.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes were like an explainer, revealing the hidden meanings behind his words.
meanings.sent5: The explainer bee danced to show the other bees where to find the flowers.

meanings.definition: A book or pamphlet that gives information or instructions.
meanings.sent1: The explainer on gardening provided tips for growing healthy plants.
meanings.sent2: I found an explainer on how to assemble the furniture in the box.
meanings.sent3: The magical explainer book promised to teach spells to make chores easier.
meanings.sent4: His mind was an explainer, unraveling the mysteries of ancient texts.
meanings.sent5: The explainer pamphlet guided hikers through the forest with detailed maps.
